<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[You're Next](/Feats.aspx?ID=553) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Fear" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=68" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 88 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 183 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7)

**Trigger**
You reduce an enemy to 0 Hit Points.

</column>

---

After downing a foe, you menacingly remind another foe that you’re coming after them next. Attempt an Intimidation check with a +2 circumstance bonus to Demoralize a single creature that you can see and that can see you. If you have legendary proficiency in Intimidation, you can use this as a free action with the same trigger.
name: You're Next
